helpText: ĺ_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ľ.

generic.title: ĺ_Error updating categories__________________________ľ
generic.message: ĺ_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ľ.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ĺ_Error updating categories__________________________ľ
maxDepthExceeded.message: ĺ_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ľ.

destinationHasSameName.title: ĺ_Error updating categories__________________________ľ
destinationHasSameName.message: ĺ_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ľ.

noSchema.title: ĺ_Schema not found_________________ľ
noSchema.message: ĺ_Item schema not found for user_________________ľ.

maxCharacter.title: ĺ_Error updating categories__________________________ľ
maxCharacter.message: ĺ_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ľ.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ĺ_Delete category________________ľ
deleteInUseCategory.message: ĺ_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ľ.

custom.title: ĺ_Custom categories__________________ľ
custom.message: ĺ_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ľ.

arcgis.title: ĺ_ArcGIS categories__________________ľ
arcgis.message: ĺ_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ľ.

iso.title: ĺ_ISO categories_______________ľ
iso.message: ĺ_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ľ.

inspire.title: ĺ_INSPIRE categories___________________ľ
inspire.message: ĺ_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ľ.
